titleStmt.title: A treasurie or store-house of similies both pleasaunt, delightfull, and profitable, for all estates of men in generall. Newly collected into heades and common places: by Robert Cawdray.
titleStmt.author: Cawdry, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Creede, dwelling in the Old Chaunge, at the signe of the Eagle and Childe, neare Old Fish-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
